best_gem_comment: This expos is an highly underrated gem! Take it, I loved all the material that we had to read/watch for this class (Icelandic Saga, Minari, etc). Its very low–key and extremely interesting as the topic of "family trees" applies to each and every one of us.
best_gem_comment_short: This expos is an highly underrated gem!

best_gem_comment: This class is an absolute GEM! Animal rights are such an overlooked yet pressing issue, and Sparsha clearly cares deeply about the topic and each and every student in the class! She gives amazing feedback on every single assignment and the outside events, while numerous, are all incredibly engaging (especially the trip to the Arboretum). WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT!!!!!!!
best_gem_comment_short: This class is an absolute GEM!

best_gem_comment: This class is a gem! Keating is the best professor and is very understanding. The topic of sports and politics is really interesting, especially if you have experience in it. Definitely take this class. The work load is not bad at all and Keating is very perceptive to students.
